title: See Before and After Photos Of Buffalo Bills Stadium With Tons of Snow Cleared By Volunteers - The Messenger
text: [Manchin to Meet With Biden Amid 2024 Speculation](/politics/manchin-to-meet-with-biden-amid-2024-speculation?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=trending_story) See Before-and-After Photos of Buffalo Bills Stadium With Tons of Snow Cleared by Volunteers With the help of eager fans, Buffalo rapidly prepared the stadium for Monday's game, which was delayed by a day due to a huge snowstorm [Kari Anderson](/author/kari-anderson) The Buffalo Bills have been busy this weekend, clearing the snow out of Highmark Stadium for the AFC Wild Card matchup against the Pittsburgh Steelers, which was [postponed](https://themessenger.com/sports/bill-steelers-wild-card-game-postponed-to-monday-afternoon?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=more_sports) to Monday at 4:30 p.m. ET after a huge winter storm hit western New York. The bulk of the storm hit on Saturday and Sunday, and Buffalo saw clear skies on Monday. But the next issue became about how to prepare the Highmark Stadium for the game. The snow was bad enough that Buffalo [put out a call to fans](https://themessenger.com/sports/buffalo-bills-need-snow-shovelers-to-clear-out-stadium-ahead-of-playoff-game-vs-steelers-after-massive-storm) to come and shovel snow, offering $20 per hour and complimentary food for folks over 18 years to help clear the stadium. Although the shovelers worked all day Sunday to get snow out of the stadium (and took the opportunity to [have some fun](https://www.espn.com/video/clip/_/id/39308932) in the process), the Bills put out an early-morning call for more shovelers on Monday, showing a photo of the field and stands still covered in snow, but with a clear sky. [Buffalo Bills Need Snow Shovelers to Clear Out Stadium Ahead of Playoff Game vs. Steelers After Massive Storm](/sports/buffalo-bills-need-snow-shovelers-to-clear-out-stadium-ahead-of-playoff-game-vs-steelers-after-massive-storm?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [WATCH: Buffalo Bills Post Video of Highmark Stadium in Blizzard After Bills-Steelers is Postponed](/sports/watch-buffalo-bills-post-video-of-highmark-stadium-in-blizzard-after-bills-steelers-is-postponed?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Bills Enlist 2,500 Workers to Clear Snow at Highmark Stadium for Playoff Game Against Steelers](/sports/bills-enlist-2500-workers-to-clear-snow-at-highmark-stadium-for-playoff-game-against-steelers?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [WATCH: Buffalo Bills Fan Goes Shirtless, Slides Down Snowy Bleachers While Shoveling Out Highmark Stadium for Today’s Game](/news/watch-buffalo-bills-fan-shirtless-slides-snow-shoveling-out-highmark-stadium-game?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Buffalo Bills Player Alec Anderson Saves New York Driver After Car is Stranded in Violent Blizzard Snow](/sports/buffalo-bills-alec-anderson-new-yorker-stranded-violent-blizzard-snow?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Buffalo Bills Fan Found Naked, Covered in Excrement at Site of New Stadium](/news/buffalo-bills-fan-found-naked-covered-in-excrement-at-site-of-new-stadium?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) The Bills also warned fans to wear waterproof pants and boots to the game, showing a photo of the stands with a significant layer of snow. By the afternoon, the stadium was ready for some playoff football, with the field nearly all cleared off and some sections of the stands (and more importantly, the stairs) cleared of snow as well. Now, as kickoff approaches, Highmark Stadium is ready — and so are the Bills, and their fans. Considering that [Highmark Stadium looked like this](https://themessenger.com/sports/watch-buffalo-bills-post-video-of-highmark-stadium-in-blizzard-after-bills-steelers-is-postponed) on Saturday, it's a minor miracle that the team was able to pull it off.
